name: Colony
description: There are 2 colonies on the playing field, one of which you control. You have to improve it, develop it technologically and defeat the enemy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 10 MB available space
